alert.note: Alert for Sioux (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 9:14AM CDT until further notice by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the Cannonball River at Breien affecting Morton and Sioux Counties in North Dakota... ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and is forecast to continue. * WHERE...Cannonball River at Breien. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Water overflows north bank. At 12.0 feet, Water overflows south bank. At 13.0 feet, Southeast part of Breien subject to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Wednesday /7:15 AM MDT Wednesday/ the stage was 11.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.9 feet Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.7 feet on 04/11/2014. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
